description: Validates that remediation beads from bd-3uqg.12.1.2 are correctly wired into dependency chains with appropriate track assignments and ownership readiness.

summary.recommendation: Remove 6 artificial parent-track dependencies to unblock 6 self-contained remediation beads

bead_inventory.title: Add common aliases for high-traffic providers
bead_inventory.notes: 14+ aliases already added. No further work needed.

bead_inventory.title: Add display_name field to ProviderMetadata
bead_inventory.notes: display_name is a self-contained metadata change. Does not need rollup handoff (bd-3uqg.10.4) to be complete first.

bead_inventory.title: Expand onboarding wizard provider recognition
bead_inventory.notes: Onboarding wizard expansion is a self-contained UX change. Does not need rollup handoff.

bead_inventory.title: Fix pi_runtime.json VCR cassette for provider_factory tests
bead_inventory.notes: VCR cassette fix is a self-contained test infra fix. Does not need the full test track parent to complete first.

bead_inventory.title: Add per-provider artifact redaction scan on e2e output
bead_inventory.notes: Redaction scan is a new test addition. Does not need the full test track parent.

bead_inventory.title: Add ci_correlation_id to JSONL log schema
bead_inventory.notes: CI correlation ID is a test infra change, not a docs change. Should not be blocked by docs track.

bead_inventory.title: Artifact-index path cross-validation
bead_inventory.notes: Artifact cross-validation is test infra, not docs. Should not be blocked by docs track.

bead_inventory.title: Define formal pi.qa.evidence_contract.v1 schema
bead_inventory.notes: Schema documentation correctly belongs under the docs track. Dependency on bd-3uqg.9 is appropriate.

bead_inventory.title: Enforce v2-only schema for new tests
bead_inventory.notes: Schema enforcement is a test/CI concern, not docs. Should not be blocked by docs track.

routing_issues.title: Provider-core remediation beads unnecessarily blocked by rollup handoff
routing_issues.analysis: bd-3uqg.10.4 (completion handoff) is deeply blocked by 6 upstream dependencies. The display_name and onboarding wizard changes are self-contained code modifications that can be implemented and tested independently. Blocking them on the rollup handoff prevents early delivery of user-facing improvements.
routing_issues.recommendation: Remove bd-3uqg.10.4 dependency from bd-mbk79 and bd-2jskn. These beads only need bd-3uqg.12.1.2 (now closed) as prerequisite.

routing_issues.title: Test remediation beads unnecessarily blocked by test track parent
routing_issues.analysis: bd-3uqg.8 is the umbrella test track that depends on 5 wave-parity beads. The VCR cassette fix and redaction scan are narrow, self-contained test improvements. They don't require the full provider test matrix to be complete.
routing_issues.recommendation: Remove bd-3uqg.8 dependency from bd-396fn and bd-2vlau. Only bd-3uqg.12.1.2 (now closed) is a true prerequisite.

routing_issues.title: Test/CI remediation beads mis-routed to docs track
routing_issues.analysis: CI correlation ID, artifact cross-validation, and v1 schema deprecation are all test infrastructure concerns. They were routed to the docs track (bd-3uqg.9) likely because the artifact contract doc (bd-3uqg.14.3.3) identified them. However, they don't require docs to be written first.
routing_issues.recommendation: Remove bd-3uqg.9 dependency from bd-2w6ts, bd-z5vt4, bd-38m8w. These are implementable independently. bd-7rs2j (evidence schema) correctly stays under docs.

test.ownership: Any agent with test infrastructure experience

actionability_after_fixes.description: If ROUTE-001/002/003 recommendations are applied, these beads become immediately actionable
